content: Figured it out, I created a rule to move new mail in the inbox down to my local inbox. Sheesh, I did that so long ago I foirgot...
creator: calm.home5344

content:
You might first want to check your preferences view etc.

If TB follows the same as policy as FF, then the previous version should be archived on the net somewhere [thunderbird.en.uptodown.com], and you could just uninstall then reinstall pointing to your existing data directory.
creator: calm.home5344
